DataElement.preferredName: Patient Recurrent Neoplasm Fulfill Clinical Study Protocol Requirement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator as to whether the patient meets eligibility criteria for the recurrent neoplasm meeting research study protocol requirements.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Recurrent Neoplasm Fulfill Clinical Study Protocol Requirement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The reemergence of a neoplasm after a period of remission._Satisfy the requirements or expectations of._A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the trial, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Recurrent Neoplasm Fulfill Clinical Study Protocol Requirement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The reemergence of a neoplasm after a period of remission.:Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.:A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the trial, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The reemergence of a neoplasm after a period of remission.
Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.

A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
